title: Reservoir Dogs
description: When a simple jewellery heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.
actors: Harvey Keitel, Tim Roth, Michael Madsen

title: The Godfather
description: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
actors: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan

title: The Terminator
description: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation
actors: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Michael Biehn

title: Planet of the Apes
description: In 2029, an Air Force astronaut crash-lands on a mysterious planet where evolved, talking apes dominate a race of primitive humans.
actors: Mark Wahlberg, Helena Bonham Carter, Tim Roth

title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
description: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.
actors: Ben Affleck, Henry Cavill, Amy Adams
